channel.title: ! urgent help, please read!
channel.description: It's the third post I make, nobody answers me, I stayed the whole day trying to find an answer, It's at night now, so please, I mean pleease... Any cool guy out there help me. I downloaded this server : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,207090.0.html and I don't know what to do after download! I downloaded it, then what? What do I have to do after downloading it? To play? Thanks. I hope someone helps me.

item.title: ! urgent help, please read!
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“tobias222, post:7, topic:161103”]No p-r-o-b-l-e-m !!! You have made my day better

Ill tell you a story of why I help people… (if you care to read)

I typed ::pits and I came to a minigame, well, it wasnt very good and the message saying “get stuff ready and use door to begin” was spelt wrong, the door didnt work and there were 3 npcs without drops. And I felt sad. Very sad, actually I almost cried, because nobody was there to help him/her when they needed it, but they even sent a message saying “Good Luck” And that didnt help. If only I was there to help them I thought… I am putting my upmost effort into fixing up that minigame. And if you know who made it please tell me, I think it was the owner of Littlescape, please tell me his/her msn / details/username It would really help . :)[/quote]

Nice Story

Read full topic

item.title: ! urgent help, please read!
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Do those thing written say : “starting … on #.#.##…#.”
?
Because that means its starting the server. Now, go onto moparscape, then login. DONT PRESS START SERVER, just login with ip: 127.0.0.1 thats localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: ! urgent help, please read!
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

If you are in Winrar: Right Click->Select All->Hit the button “Extract To” then find a folder where you want it to be, then hit the run server.

Read full topic
